Full job description

Job Title: Python Developer

Location: Gurugram, Haryana

Type: Full-time, On-site (Work From Office)

Immediate Joining or Serving candidate with Max 10-12 days Notice Period

Responsibilities:

  • Develop robust and scalable Python-based applications.
  • Design and implement RESTful APIs using Django, FastAPI, or Flask.
  • Utilize various data storage solutions such as MySQL, MongoDB, etc., for data persistence.
  • Implement caching mechanisms to improve application performance.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Participate in code reviews, ensuring code quality and standards are maintained.
  • Deploy applications on AWS and maintain infrastructure as needed.
  • Troubleshoot issues, fix bugs, and improve application performance.

Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
  • Minimum 4 years of experience in Python development with Django, FastAPI, or Flask.
  • Solid understanding of relational databases (MySQL) and NoSQL databases (MongoDB).
  • Experience with caching mechanisms such as Redis or Memcached.
  • Proficiency in version control systems, particularly Git.
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms, especially AWS services like EC2, S3, RDS, etc.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot operational issues.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team.

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Pay: ₹388,847.25 - ₹1,633,192.81 per year

Schedule:

  • Monday to Friday

Education:

  • Bachelor's (Preferred)

Experience:

  • Python: 4 years (Required)
  • total work: 4 years (Required)

Work Location: In person
